title: Humble Pie "Smokin' " album cover
content:
Anybody know if Smokin’ is a font or if it is 100 % custom?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [smokin.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100107094259/http:/typophile.com/files/smokin.jpg) | 45.11 KB |
author: Dimitri Kayiambakis

comments.content:
I’d say definitely custom.

Nick Cooke

There are some similar shapes to be found in [Gentry](http://web.archive.org/web/20100107094259/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/gentry/) and [Platinum](http://web.archive.org/web/20100107094259/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/platinum/).
